metadata.title: CVE-2021-28166 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: In Eclipse Mosquitto version 2.0.0 to 2.0.9, if an authenticated client that had connected with MQTT v5 sent a crafted CONNACK message to the broker, a NULL pointer dereference would occur.

criterions.comment: mosquitto package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
